bug.heading: Summary. In submodule Рекомендации word Пользователь starts from different font case
bug.body: Description. In submodule Рекомендации word Пользователь, first letters of the forms of the word Пользователь are not in some in upper, some in lower. Reprodused on: Win 7, GC 65 Actual_result.Different cases of the firs letters of the forms of the word Пользователь Expected_result.Indentical case ofthe first letters of the forms of the word Пользователь Steps to reproduce 1.Open URL http://kot.ru 2.Skroll to the end of the main page 3.Click Важные рекомендации at the foter 4.Skroll to the end of the red section Сообщайте нам обо всех нарушениях
